description: Mason has a hot little treat for you to feast your eyes on this week and he goes by the name of A.J. Irons.This open minded and super hot straight guy has done a few other scenes for us in the last month, so it was only a matter of time before he made his way over to sex-fiend Mason's site for some 1 on 1 action.The thing we love about A.J. is that he may be straight, but he's so passionate when he's with a guy, he could have fooled us.Mason and A.J. begin with deep, passionate kissing before stripping off their clothes and jumping into some good ol' cock sucking and ass licking.There's no fucking in this scene, but with all the other hot kinkiness going on, it won't matter.Enjoy!
title: Mason Wyler & A.J. Irons
